mapper.select: SELECT order_no , goods_no , order_price , delivery , TO_CHAR( payment_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD' ) payment_date , order_status , card_no , crew_no , address_no , order_qty , goods_name , img_name FROM orders WHERE crew_no = #{crew_no} AND payment_date BETWEEN payment_date and TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(payment_date, 1))
